title: Transfers still down
body:
Hello,i am quite unpatient now..the server transfer is kept in maintanance already for almost 1 month..again changing dates over and over .
Today it was supposed to be the day the transfers start to be available. I checked the tranfers if they are up and guess what. THEY ARE NOT.
please someone from RIOT can you explain us why are you not honest with us?.  
We just want to change region and play with other friends..

replies.body:
Transfers weren't meant to be available today, they were (and still are) meant to be available tomorrow at 4:00pm aest.

I don't know if the date ever changed, but I checked it for someone else two weeks ago and it said the 16th, so it hasn't changed anytime recently.
